findings.title: QSP-3 Unlimited Allowance
findings.description: The function `ERC20(coin).approve` is called with the maximum value, which is considered a security anti-pattern and could lead to end-user wallet funds being drained if the contract is exploited.

findings.title: QSP-10 Inconsistent Constants Between Code and Curve Specs
findings.description: The `Curve` interface uses the `BASE_N_COINS` constant with functions `calc_token_amount` and `add_liquidity`, but the specs show that `N_COINS` constant is used, which may lead to issues since the values of these 2 constants are different for the RAI pool.
